SELECT CR.CHTT_ROOM_NO, CHTT_ROOM_TY, CHTT_ROOM_NM, READ_COUNT, NVL(M.MSSAGE_CREAT_DT, CR.CHTT_CREAT_DT) AS CHTT_CREAT_DT, M.MSSAGE_CN as LAST_MSG, CE.EMPL_NO, M.MSSAGE_TY, E.EMPL_NM, E.PROFL_PHOTO_URL FROM (SELECT B.CHTT_ROOM_NO, B.LAST_MSSAGE_NO, B.CHTT_CREAT_DT, B.CHTT_ROOM_NM, B.CHTT_ROOM_TY, NVL(B.LAST_MSSAGE_NO - A.LAST_CNFIRM_NO, 0) as READ_COUNT
FROM CHAT_EMP A LEFT JOIN CHAT_ROOM B ON (A.CHTT_ROOM_NO = B.CHTT_ROOM_NO) WHERE EMPL_NO = #{emplNo} ) CR LEFT JOIN CHAT_EMP CE ON(CE.CHTT_ROOM_NO = CR.CHTT_ROOM_NO AND CE.EMPL_NO != #{emplNo}) LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (E.EMPL_NO = CE.EMPL_NO) LEFT JOIN CHAT_MESSAGE M ON (M.MSSAGE_SN = CR.LAST_MSSAGE_NO AND M.CHTT_ROOM_NO = CR.CHTT_ROOM_NO) ORDER BY CHTT_CREAT_DT DESC
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(MSSAGE_SN), 0) + 1 FROM CHAT_MESSAGE WHERE CHTT_ROOM_NO = #{chttRoomNo}
INSERT INTO CHAT_MESSAGE(CHTT_ROOM_NO, MSSAGE_SN, MSSAGE_WRITNG_EMPNO, MSSAGE_CN, MSSAGE_TY, MSSAGE_CREAT_DT) VALUES (#{chttRoomNo}, #{mssageSn}, #{mssageWritngEmpno}, #{mssageCn}, #{mssageTy}, #{mssageCreatDt})
mapper.select: SELECT MSSAGE_SN, M.MSSAGE_WRITNG_EMPNO, CHTT_ROOM_NO, MSSAGE_CN, M.MSSAGE_CREAT_DT, MSSAGE_TY, E.EMPL_NO, EMPL_NM, E.PROFL_PHOTO_URL FROM CHAT_MESSAGE M LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (M.MSSAGE_WRITNG_EMPNO = E.EMPL_NO) WHERE CHTT_ROOM_NO = #{chttRoomNo} ORDER BY MSSAGE_SN
